{"id":439837031,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1610032263,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/439837031/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<int,int> pos;\n        int ans = 0;\n        int earliest = -1;\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); ++i) {\n            if (pos.find(s[i]) != pos.end()) {\n                earliest = max(earliest, pos[s[i]]); \n            }\n            pos[s[i]] = i;\n            ans = max(ans, i - earliest);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
